condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: In 2019, the Country Office supported capacity building aimed at the development and implementation of adequate policies and legislation for the control of micronutrient deficiencies and IYCF. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
